sourcekit-lsp.inlayHints.enabled.description: Render inlay type annotations in the editor. Inlay hints require Swift 5.6 or later.

sourcekit-lsp.serverArguments.description: Arguments to pass to Sourcekit-LSP. Argument keys and values should be provided as separate entries in the array e.g. ['--log-level', 'debug']

sourcekit-lsp.serverPath.markdownDescription: The path of the `sourcekit-lsp` executable. The default is to look in the path where `swift` is found.

sourcekit-lsp.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the SourceKit-LSP language server.

swift.autoGenerateLaunchConfigurations.markdownDescription: When loading a `Package.swift`, auto-generate `launch.json` configurations for running any executables.

swift.backgroundCompilation.markdownDescription: **Experimental**: Run `swift build` in the background whenever a file is saved.

swift.buildArguments.markdownDescription: Arguments to pass to `swift build`. Keys and values should be provided as separate entries. If you have created a copy of the build task in `tasks.json` then these build arguments will not be propogated to that task.

swift.diagnostics.description: Output additional diagnostics to the Swift Output View.

swift.excludePathsFromPackageDependencie.description: A list of paths to exclude from the Package Dependencies view.

swift.path.markdownDescription: The path of the folder containing the Swift executables. The default is to look in **$PATH**.

swift.problemMatchCompileErrors.description: List compile errors in the Problems View.

swift.testEnvironmentVariables.markdownDescription: Environment variables to set when running tests. To set environment variables when debugging an application you should edit the relevant `launch.json` configuration
